<java version="1.5.0_12" class="java.beans.XMLDecoder"> 
 <object class="fiorano.esb.adapter.cfg.ConfigurationObject"> 
  <void property="beanClassName"> 
   <class>com.fiorano.adapter.jca.db.cci.DBInteractionSpec</class> 
  </void> 
  <void property="beanObject"> 
   <void property="DBServicePropertyModelXml"> 
    <string>
&lt;Model&gt;
  &lt;Data&gt;&amp;lt;?xml version=&amp;quot;1.0&amp;quot; encoding=&amp;quot;UTF-8&amp;quot;?&amp;gt;
&amp;lt;Tif_DBAdapterConfiguration&amp;gt;
   &amp;lt;Tif_DatabaseConfiguration&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_DBVendor/&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_Driver/&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_DatabaseUrl/&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_Username/&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_Password/&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_AutoCommit&amp;gt;false&amp;lt;/Tif_AutoCommit&amp;gt;
   &amp;lt;/Tif_DatabaseConfiguration&amp;gt;
   &amp;lt;Tif_SQLConfiguration name=&amp;quot;SQL_CFG_1&amp;quot; type=&amp;quot;RequestReply&amp;quot; inputType=&amp;quot;Data&amp;quot; runMode=&amp;quot;Sequential&amp;quot; sendOutputMode=&amp;quot;AfterEveryQuery&amp;quot; dataFormat=&amp;quot;xml&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_PreProcessing/&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_QueryInfo name=&amp;quot;Insert&amp;quot; outputNeedToBeSent=&amp;quot;true&amp;quot; postProcessingMode=&amp;quot;AfterEverySend&amp;quot; includeQueryNameInOutput=&amp;quot;true&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
         &amp;lt;Tif_Statement&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InsertQuery&amp;gt;INSERT INTO TIFOSITEST.PURCHASEORDERS
( ORDERID, CUSTOMERID, EMAIL, SHIPMODE, SHIPADDRESS, SHIPCOUNTRY, 
SHIPPOSTALCODE, SHIPPHONENUMBER, PRODUCT, QUANTITY, PRICE, BILLAMOUNT, 
ORDERDATE )
VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )&amp;lt;/Tif_InsertQuery&amp;gt;
         &amp;lt;/Tif_Statement&amp;gt;
         &amp;lt;Tif_QueryRequest&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;1&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;ORDERID&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;NUMBER&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;DECIMAL&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/ORDERID&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;2&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;CUSTOMERID&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/CUSTOMERID&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;3&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;EMAIL&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/EMAIL&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;4&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;SHIPMODE&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/SHIPMODE&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;5&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;SHIPADDRESS&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/SHIPADDRESS&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;6&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;SHIPCOUNTRY&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/SHIPCOUNTRY&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;7&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;SHIPPOSTALCODE&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/SHIPPOSTALCODE&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;8&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;SHIPPHONENUMBER&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/SHIPPHONENUMBER&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;9&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;PRODUCT&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/PRODUCT&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;10&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;QUANTITY&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/QUANTITY&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;11&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;PRICE&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/PRICE&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;12&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;BILLAMOUNT&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/BILLAMOUNT&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_InParameter bindPosition=&amp;quot;13&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;ORDERDATE&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR2&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;VARCHAR&amp;quot; map=&amp;quot;/Insert/ORDERDATE&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
         &amp;lt;/Tif_QueryRequest&amp;gt;
         &amp;lt;Tif_QueryResponse&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;Tif_ResultSet outputName=&amp;quot;Insert&amp;quot; includeInOutput=&amp;quot;true&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
               &amp;lt;Tif_Column bindPosition=&amp;quot;1&amp;quot; bindName=&amp;quot;UpdateCount&amp;quot; sqlTypeName=&amp;quot;NUMBER&amp;quot; javaTypeName=&amp;quot;INTEGER&amp;quot; includeInOutput=&amp;quot;true&amp;quot; outputName=&amp;quot;UpdateCount&amp;quot; OutputType=&amp;quot;PCDATA&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;/Tif_ResultSet&amp;gt;
         &amp;lt;/Tif_QueryResponse&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;/Tif_QueryInfo&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_PostProcessing/&amp;gt;
   &amp;lt;/Tif_SQLConfiguration&amp;gt;
   &amp;lt;Tif_TypeDefinition/&amp;gt;
   &amp;lt;Tif_AdvancedSettings&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_QueryTimeout&amp;gt;60&amp;lt;/Tif_QueryTimeout&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_JdbcDriverLoggingEnabled&amp;gt;false&amp;lt;/Tif_JdbcDriverLoggingEnabled&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_MaxFetchSize&amp;gt;200&amp;lt;/Tif_MaxFetchSize&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_MaxResponseSize&amp;gt;100&amp;lt;/Tif_MaxResponseSize&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_MaxBatchUpdateSize&amp;gt;0&amp;lt;/Tif_MaxBatchUpdateSize&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_Commit mode=&amp;quot;AfterDocument&amp;quot;/&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_DateTimeFormat&amp;gt;MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss&amp;lt;/Tif_DateTimeFormat&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_EnableResponseGUID&amp;gt;false&amp;lt;/Tif_EnableResponseGUID&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_EnableInputSend&amp;gt;false&amp;lt;/Tif_EnableInputSend&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_SendNoRowSelectedOutput&amp;gt;false&amp;lt;/Tif_SendNoRowSelectedOutput&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_CloseConnectionAfterEveryRequest&amp;gt;false&amp;lt;/Tif_CloseConnectionAfterEveryRequest&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_Param name=&amp;quot;DBConnectionPingSQL&amp;quot;&amp;gt;select count(*) from tab&amp;lt;/Tif_Param&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_Param name=&amp;quot;ValidateDBConUsingDummyTable&amp;quot;&amp;gt;false&amp;lt;/Tif_Param&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_Param name=&amp;quot;ValidateInputXML&amp;quot;&amp;gt;false&amp;lt;/Tif_Param&amp;gt;
      &amp;lt;Tif_Param name=&amp;quot;DummyTableName&amp;quot;&amp;gt;TIFOSI_DUMMY&amp;lt;/Tif_Param&amp;gt;
   &amp;lt;/Tif_AdvancedSettings&amp;gt;
&amp;lt;/Tif_DBAdapterConfiguration&amp;gt;&lt;/Data&gt;
  &lt;Data&gt;#dbconfig&#13;
#Mon Sep 05 15:58:35 IST 2005&#13;
Database\ Connection\ Ping\ SQL=select count(*) from tab&#13;
Enable\ Native\ Format=false&#13;
Validate\ Connection\ using\ Dummy\ Table=false&#13;
SQL\ Configuration\ Name=SQL_CFG_1&#13;
Dummy\ Table\ Name=TIFOSI_DUMMY&#13;
ADVANCED2=false&#13;
Commit\ Mode=AfterDocument&#13;
ADVANCED1=false&#13;
Maximum\ Fetch\ Size=200&#13;
SCHEDULER_ENABLED=Request-Reply&#13;
DateTimeFormat=MM/dd/yyyy HH\:mm\:ss&#13;
Add\ Response\ GUID=false&#13;
Validate\ Input\ XML=false&#13;
Maximum\ Response\ Size=100&#13;
Generate\ response\ for\ no\ selected\ records=false&#13;
Close\ Database\ Connection\ After\ Every\ Request=false&#13;
&lt;/Data&gt;
&lt;/Model&gt;</string> 
   </void>
